Title: My go to lip gloss
ReviewText: I love the collection! It’s super cute and it’s literally all essentials. I love this lip gloss it is vegan and cruelty free so that’s definitely the requirements for me to wear something on my face. It does feel a little thick on your lips, this has never bothered me but i know it will bother some of you.

Title: Gorgeous Shine!
ReviewText: Love this brand and this gloss is just absolutely gorgeous! It’s high shine and you really only need a little bit. The color is absolute stunning (Nearly Apricot) just the right amount of pink! It smells like cake too!! The shine looks great and also helps to hydrate your lips all day long.

Title: Good moisturizing gloss
ReviewText: I really like this gloss because it’s super moisturizing like a lip balm, but has a glossy appearance(also not sticky at all). The color is very sheer & definitely isn’t as dark as it does in the tube, but with 2-3 coats you can see a very subtle wash of color. It’s a nice everyday gloss for a very natural look(what I personally like). I’d love to see Rare come out with glosses that are highly pigmented with the same feel as these.

Title: Great
ReviewText: This is perfect! It’s like a balm and gloss combined. It is not sticky and I see myself using it a lot . So happy I got to try it. The color is really nice and The color is great for everyday use. Must try!

Title: favorite!!
ReviewText: my favorite of the colors!! lovely!! I have two of the other shades (apricot and neutral) and am officially in love.  my lips are frequently dry and it's such a relief to finally have a lip gloss that doesn't dry me out!

Title: yessssss
ReviewText: lovely!! I have two of the other shades (neutral and mauve) and am officially in love.  my lips are frequently dry and it's such a relief to finally have a lip gloss that doesn't dry me out! very balmy texture! and perfect amount of pigment

Title: leaves my lips soft
ReviewText: lovely!! I have two of the other shades (apricot and mauve) and am officially in love.  my lips are frequently dry and it's such a relief to finally have a lip gloss that doesn't dry me out!

Title: so soft and creamy
ReviewText: I got this as a sample when you spend $25. I wanted to try it before I committed and I am sold. The color is very subtle and matches my exact lip color. I am more of a clear/nude lipgloss girl and this color did not disappoint. I was very shocked on how creamy this gloss is. Your lips feel so smooth. It’s a thin formula but it is very hydrating, not sticky at all. It feels like a glossy balm. It last about 3 hours on my lips before I felt like I had to reapply. I will be purchasing the full size.

I love the color and packaging of this lip gloss from Rare Beauty! I have the apricot color and it's really pretty. I like that these lip glosses aren't sticky and feel nourishing on my lips. I want to try more colors.

Title: I’m loving it!
ReviewText: This is such a wonderful gloss! The shade I got, nearly Berry, is perfect for my darker skin and the gloss feels really balmy rather than sticky. It hydrates my lips well over a lip liner and I’m really enjoying how natural it looks since I’m not doing full makeup looks nowadays.

Title: Lovely Gloss!
ReviewText: I love how this gloss feels on my lips. It has such a soft velvet feel to it and is not sticky at all. The gloss feels very hydrating and the shade compliments the natural color of my lips. I highly recommend this product and it really is the perfect hybrid of a balm and gloss!

Title: Comfortable, and so gorgeous!
ReviewText: This is exactly as described! It’s the perfect hybrid between a gloss and a balm! It’s incredibly comfortable to wear and the color is absolutely stunning! It’s not sticky whatsoever, and there’s no bad scent!
Enjoying the feel of this glossy lip balm, not sticky and feels hydrating. The color ‘nearly neutral’ is the perfect shade and would look good on anyone.

I love the formula and how it is a liquid lip balm with a tint instead of a stickier gloss. The tube packaging is super unique and has a flat side so it won't roll off your vanity. The nearly mauve shade is not too different from my natural lip color and adds just a hint of color and some shine. Most importantly my lips are left SO HYDRATED!! I will definitely be purchasing other shades.

What a great formula! It spreads really nicely but also feels really hydrating. It definitely has some pigment but it’s not over the top. It’s perfect for a quick little dab of color but won’t dry out my lips :)

Title: So pretty!!
ReviewText: I looove this formula. I got the shade Nearly Mauve & it’s gorgeous. It’s a sheer glossy balm formula that leaves the right amount of color on your lips. It’s totally Perfect for day & night. This one is definitely staying in my purse!!

Title: Hydrating n Glossy
ReviewText: Im so excited to try out this beauty. What an beautiful packaging it has firstly. Im a big time gloss fan and if my gloss is non sticky then its a plus. This gloss is so hydrated and non sticky. Love how weightless, natural looking and glossy it is. Its left my lips smooth and soft. Love the applicator too which swipe on lips easily. I can see myself end up buying all shades soon I guess. Such a comfortable lip gloss which feels like a balm.

Title: SO PRETTY
ReviewText: Love love love this gloss! It is so hydrating like a balm and not sticky like other glosses! Must try!

I really love this gloss. It feels like a hydrated cushion and it isn’t sticky, and it isn’t so light that it feels like it will wipe off easily. I chose Nearly Apricot for a hint of color but I hardly see any color with this gloss. I will most likely purchase a deeper shade. Overall, I recommend this gloss!

This really hydrates like a balm, but shines like a gloss! I love how weighless, nourishing & how it doesn't feel sticky. It provides just enough natural color to your lips & I can see myself wearing this on a daily basis!

Title: Looks like a gloss, feels like a balm
ReviewText: The color is discreet, not sticky... i really recommend it

Title: Must Try
ReviewText: This has got to be my favourite lip gloss. I love how the colour is very light yet still there. It’s also not sticky which I find a lot of lip glosses are. I love these lip glosses I definitely will buy more shades.

Title: So pretty
ReviewText: Gorgeous gloss that pairs perfectly with the rest of the nearly neutral collection. Has great coverage and isnt overly sticky. No overpowering scent either which is important to me due to migraines. Would recommend.
Super hydrating on the lips. Love the color! Will be purchasing more from this collection. Not much of a lip gloss girl and I must say I really enjoy putting this on.

Title: Amazing formula, 10/10 would recommend!
ReviewText: Amazing formula! I tought this product would be closer to a lipgloss texture, but it's actually a lip balm texture with a slight tint. I have very dry lips and most lip balm are only okay to me. But for some reason, this left my lips so soft and smooth! I can't believe it.

I am always searching for the perfect Mauve shade and this Rare Beauty lip gloss definitely hits the mark.  I already had the Nearly Neutral I had picked up in a special Rouge presale, but it was not nearly as beautiful as this gorgeous Mauve.  I love that the glosses are not sticky.  Beautiful comfortable formula.
This gloss is so comfy on your lips! Just feels like a lip balm with a hint of colour it’s soooo pretty!

Title: Ended up loving it!
ReviewText: I’m a huge lip balm fan so I was excited to try this product! At first I was a little thrown off by the packaging. It has one completely flat side. Upon thinking about and this brand I wondered if it was so it was easier to open. I did find with the flat side it was a lot easier to open then your typical tube. The wand applicator threw me off as well because it has a tapered point all around but it was very easy to apply to the lips while the lips were closed. It took literally 5 seconds to apply the balm flawlessly. It does feel like your typical balm without any sticky feeling. It gives a sheer wash of color (I have Nearly Mauve) to the lips that is very flattering (especially right now when we can’t exactly wear lipsticks). It leaves your lips very soft and cushiony. I’m a fan!

Title: Great gloss!
ReviewText: I absolutely am loving this gloss so far! It is not sticky and lasts a good period of time before having to reapply! Would definitely like to try some other shades. I also love the color payoff and that it’s just the right amount.

Tried a sample of this and I LOVE the formula! Nearly Neutral is definitely a "your lips but better" shade. It feels exactly like a lip balm both in terms of texture and hydration. I don't expect it to last too long, but definitely a great everyday and could probably layer over dryer mattes.

Title: Hydration and Shine
ReviewText: The name "Glossy Lip Balm" describes this product perfectly. It is a non-sticky, conditioning lipgloss that adds shine and hydration. These are not meant to be pigmented and appear darker in the tube than they would on the lips. Nearly Mauve appears as a deep rose in the tube, but applies like a very sheer, wash of berry tint on the lips.

Title: 10/10 would recommend
ReviewText: I love how beautiful the packaging and the actual product is! For the cost, it is quite high value. This is more sheer than I expected but it gives a beautiful glow/ glossy feel to your lip! It only lasts for a few hours, but it’s expected of a gloss product! Overall I would really recommend this lip gloss above others due to its high quality and value

It gives a nice wash of color which I personally really enjoy because it allows me to use it with different eye looks.

Title: Must try

Title: Big fan of this gloss!

It just gives you the right amount of product and it gives you a lot of control when applying it your lips. I think it's one of the best lip gloss in the market right now.

I bought this in the mauve and the nude the application is great! Just the texture throws me off it looks like it would be a gloss but feels like a lip balm. It doesn’t last long but it’s so comfortable on the lips and has NO taste huge win!!!

Title: New holy grail lip formula!
ReviewText: This is the perfect subtle lip product, and I can’t wait to try more shades. It feels like a nourishing balm, somewhat similar to Huda’s Silk Balm or the Lancôme Labsolu Lacquer, and adds the perfect flush of color. Definitely going to repurchase when I finish!

Title: A beautiful lipbalm
ReviewText: This is my second time trying anything from Rare Beauty asides from the liquid eyeshadow.  The glossy lip balm shade I got was nearly rose flushed pink. The color is so gorgeous as well and my lips are soft, plumped and hydrated.

Title: Amazing for the price
